grading_explanation.practical_foundation: 2.9/3 – 26 of 35 fields filled (74% completion). Higher completion indicates better self-awareness and thoroughness.
grading_explanation.technical_competency: 1.8/2 – Strong technical skills with minor gaps that can be quickly filled; programming languages: Python, machine learning, deep learning, prompt engineering, data analysis, Git, GitHub, Jupyter, Aden; tools: Excel
grading_explanation.hands_on_experience: 2.0/3 – Good potential: 1+ internships OR 2+ projects with decent technical detail and problem-solving evidence (COTHON Solutions internship and ConvAi project)
grading_explanation.growth_potential: 1.5/2 – Some leadership experience OR strong career direction OR demonstrated learning initiative (university coding and AI clubs, participating in tech fests, hackathons, and social initiatives)

hiring_insights.strongest_assets: [COTHON Solutions internship, ConvAi project, solid technical skills with minor gaps]
development_areas: academic fields not explicitly stated, more hands-on experience in industry-specific projects
